concept.title: The translate attribute
concept.shortdesc: The translate attribute provides information about whether the content of an element should be translated.

conbody.p: The following values are valid: yes, no, and -dita-use-conref-target.

A few elements have the translate attribute set by default to no. These elements include draft-comment and required-cleanup, all elements that are designed to hold content that is not intended for publication.

The non-normative appendix, , includes information on whether the element is block or inline, whether the element contents are likely to be suitable for translation, and whether the element has attributes whose values might need translation.
